alert.note: Alert for Shelby; Talladega (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 09 at 7:26PM CDT until August 09 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Talladega County in east central Alabama... Northeastern Shelby County in central Alabama... * Until 845 PM CDT. * At 726 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Westover, or near Chelsea, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sylacauga, Chelsea, Childersburg, Wilsonville, Vincent, Harpersville, Westover, Oak Grove, Bon Air, Winterboro, Alpine, Sycamore, Sylacauga Municipal Airport, Overbrook, Gantts Quarry, Varnons, Gaston Steam Plant and Mignon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
